rdfs:label: DAML-S
ns:common.topic.description: The DARPA agent markup language for services is a semantic markup language for describing web services and related ontologies.\nDAML-S is built on top of DAML+OIL.\nDAML-S has been superseded by OWL-S

ns:common.document.text: The DARPA agent markup language for services (DAML-S) is a semantic markup language for describing web services and related ontologies.\nDAML-S is built on top of DAML+OIL.\nDAML-S has been superseded by OWL-S

ns:type.object.name: DAML-S
